game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep within the nearby forest, where an ancient civilization once thrived. The city is said to hold many secrets and treasures, including a powerful artifact that could change the course of history.
game.reward: 10,000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to dark magic
game.quest-giver: Thoric Stonebeard, a renowned archaeologist and historian

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local villagers and travelers
task.description: Speak with the locals in the nearby village to gather any information they may have about the lost city. They may be willing to share rumors, stories, or clues that could aid you on your quest.

task.objective: Retrieve a map of the surrounding forest from the local cartographer
task.description: The local cartographer, a skilled mapmaker named Elara, may have created a detailed map of the surrounding forest. Acquire this map to help guide you through the treacherous terrain.

task.objective: Navigate the forest and reach the entrance of the lost city
task.description: Using the map obtained from Elara, make your way through the dense forest. Be cautious of wild beasts, treacherous terrain, and rival treasure hunters.
task.location: The Forest of Whispers, Entrance to Eldarath
